shortdesc.ph: Updates the wildcard token used for preloaded channels.
Updates the wildcard token used for preloading a channel.

section.p: You need to manage the lifecycle of the wildcard token yourself. When the token expires, generate a new wildcard token and call this method with the new token.
You need to manage the lifecycle of the wildcard token yourself. When the token expires, generate a new wildcard token and call this method with the new token.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: Applicable to scenarios involving multiple channels. For example, when switching between different channels, using a wildcard token allows you to avoid requesting a new token each time a user joins a new channel, thereby saving channel switching time and reducing the load on your token server.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter, such as an invalid token. Please pass in valid parameters and rejoin the channel.
-7: The object is not initialized. Please initialize the object before calling this method.

< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter, such as an invalid token. You need to pass a valid parameter and rejoin the channel.
-7: object is not initialized. You need to initialize the object before calling this method.
